content.rendered:
Directed by Arshad Siddiqui.

Written by Bobby Khan. Arshad Siddiqui. Turaz.

Cast Pankaj Berry(Jaspal Chaudhary). Anubhav Dhir(Badri). Hritu Dudani(Rani Kasturi Devi). Aprajita Mahajan(Kajri).Pixie Mahajan. Sharad Malhotra(Kunwar Aditya Pratap Singh). Melanie Nazareth(Sonali). Gargi Patel(Rani Saheba). Vishwajeet Pradhan(Maharaj Narsingh champion). Deepraj Rana(Suryakant Singh Chauhan). Padam Singh(Ranveer Singh)

Language Hindi.

Producers Santosh K. Mishra. Pradeep K Sharma.
